description: Smallest of first string of exactly 2n-1 consecutive composite integers.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..672 (from Nicely link)
Thomas R. Nicely, First occurrence prime gaps
mathematica: Reap[For[k=2, k <= 80, k = k+2, p=3; q=5; While[q-p != k, p=q; q=NextPrime[p+1]]; Print[p+1]; Sow[p+1]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, May 17 2013, after Klaus Brockhaus *)
author: _Erich Friedman_
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 27 2001
